verses.roman:
sei saba loka pathe karena sevana
sukhe nīlācala āilā śacīra nandana

synonyms: sei saba loka—all those persons; pathe—on the road; karena sevana—rendered all service; sukhe—in great happiness; nīlācala—to Jagannātha Purī; āilā—came back; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī.
translation: The devotees who accompanied Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu rendered all kinds of service on the way to Nīlācala, Jagannātha Purī. Thus in great happiness the Lord returned.
